title: Sassy Definition Women's Fashion Relaxed T-Shirt Tee
features: STYLE: A must-have comfortable and RELAXED FIT, SUPER SOFT blend of cotton/polyester with CREW NECK TEE, SHORT SLEEVES.

SIZE AND FIT: If you are between sizes, PLEASE CHOOSE A SIZE UP. Model is 5'7" and wearing a size small. [NOTE: The GENERIC AMAZON size chart above differs from this item.] REFER TO SIZING CHART IN THE IMAGE GALLERY
STORY: At Thread Tank, we believe in telling great stories and treasuring beautiful memories. Find your STORY here and share it with the WORLD. - "Stories you can wear."
DESIGN: Unique designs and exceptional craftsmanship. CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Machine wash cold inside-out. Tumble dry low inside-out. Do not bleach.
description: Some might call you impertinent, and others might call you rude. But who cares what they think? Youve never been one to sully your attitude with latitude, and youre not about to start now!

We offer the most comfortable tops with a story behind every design. Our story goes back to the root of everyday wear with a focus on fit and commitment to quality. Printed on our signature relaxed crew tee. Style effortlessly with this super comfy top. You can layer this tee with almost any outfit for a casual day outing or semi-formal night event.
Designed and Printed in the USA.
